gurmukhi: Awid ABY AngwiD srUpM ]rwg rMg ijh ryK n rUpM ]
transliteration: Aadh Abhai Anaddh(i) Daroopan|| Raag Ran Jih Rekh Na Roopan||
translation: Thou art Primal, fearless and Unfathomable Entity; Thou art without affection, colour, mark and form.

gurmukhi: rMk BXo rwvq khUM BUpM ]khUM smuMdR sirqw khUM kUpM ]7]27]
transliteration: Rank Bhayo Raavat Kahoon Bhoopan|| Kahoon Samounndra Saritaa Kahoon Koopan||7||27||
translation: Somewhere Thou art pauper, somewhere chieftain and somwerher king. Somewhere Thou art ocean, somewhere stream and somewhere a well.7.27.

gurmukhi: srqw khUM kUpM smuMd srUpM AlK ibBUqM Aimq gqM ]
transliteration: Sartaa Kahoon Koopan Samounnd Daroopan Alakh Bibhootan Amit Gadan||
translation: Somewhere Thou art in the form of stream, somewhere well and somewhere Ocean; Thou art of Incomprehensible wealth and Unlimited movement.

gurmukhi: AdÍY AibnwsI prm pRkwsI qyj surwsI AkiRq kiRqM ]
translation: Thou art Non-dual, Indestructible, Illuminator of thy light, the outlay of splendour and Creator of the Uncreated.

gurmukhi: ijh rUp n ryKM AlK AByKM Aimq AdÍYKM srb meI ]
transliteration: Jih Roop Na Rekhanndalakh Abhaakhannddamig Advaikhanndsarab Maee||
translation: Thou art without form and mark, Thou art Incomprehensible, Guiseless, Unlimited, Unblemished, manifesting all forms.

gurmukhi: sB iklivK hrxM piqq auDrxM Asrix srxM eyk deI ]8]28]
transliteration: Sabh Kilvikh Haranan Patit Udharanan Asaran(i) Saranan Ek Daee||8||28||
translation: Thou art the remover of sins, the redeemer of sinners and the only Motivator of keeping the patronless under refuge.8.28.
Thou hast long arms uptil Thy Kness, thou holdest the bow in Thy hand.
Thou hast unlimited light, Thou art the illuminator of light in the world.

gurmukhi: KVg pwx Kl dl bl hrxM ]
transliteration: Khadag Paan Khal Dal Bal Haranan||
translation: Thou art the bearer of sword in Thy hand and remover of the strength of the forces of foolish tyrants.
Thou art the Most Powerful and Sustainer of the Universe.9.29.
